name: Richard Wharton
text: OK for a buffet. Not a lot of choices. Baked potato pizza was good. A bit pricey. More than CiCis, especially if you order a drink, but the pizza is better overall.

name: Mrs Beard
text: This management is unprofessional. The young brunette has very bad attitude, I overheard her mad at other customers and saying mean things when they turned away. worker have conversations that are not fit for the public. Much less a "family ‚Ä¶More

name: Kimberly Houck
text: Waited for 20 minutes for pasta .  Asked leader and she muttered something . Finally asked a little lady and she pulled cold pasta and put it in the hot water???   That's all it took and leader couldn't ask anyone to do it??? She got real quiet when I thanked the girl for doing a fine job.

name: Shereada Doakes
text: The price is great. Reminds me of a moms and pops Cici's. The pizza is good, not a huge variety. I will pass on the pasta but the salad bar was good. Bathroom was pretty gross. Decent family experience. Make sure you get a rewards card.

name: Naomi Aguilar
text: Clean place to sit down and enjoy a variety of pizza and salad.  Staff could be a little more friendly though. Other than that it's a good place to eat.

name: Shelly Gaugh
text: Good food. Great value especially on days kids eat free. They are willing to make you specialty pizzas & have awesome dessert pizzas like Turtle Cheesecake & Banana Pudding. Friendly staff.

name: David White
text: Looking for Gluten Free crust?  You got it!  Great buffet selections too.

name: Elizabeth Elliott
text: Food good. Nice selection. Reasonable prices. staff is nice and friendly. Party room.

name: Stacey Dalton
text: A good variety of pizza and a fresh salad bar. It is very reasonably priced especially with the "Kids Eat Free" nights.

name: Frank Romeo
text: Awesome experience , we were treated like family. It us a great place to eat a good meal.

name: Ohana Crusades
text: This is a family friendly place. It's not my first choice for a place but my kids love it and usually we come as a treat for them. Awesome place though!

name: Rick Wilson
text: Good buffet. Bar was well stocked with hot slices. Dessert pizza was yummy and the salad was fresh and crisp...yummy!  üëçüëç

name: Betty Roe
text: It was delicious. Great service

name: Kimberly Taylor
text: Pizza was cold when we got there but fresh pizza was presented later and it was really good.

name: Veda Jackson
text: Love their buffet...very affordable

name: David Wharton
text: Good food; friendly staff.  I have no complaints.

name: Jamayla Hill
text: Today was my first and last time eating here. The pizza was bland no sauce on it. My salad was great. I wasn't impressed with them at all.

name: Jeremiah Looney
text: 60 cent wings on Wednesday and kids eat free on Sundays.  Great food and standard prices. Best pizza buffet price around

name: Alyce Parker
text: Love going here. They are nice and friendly.  And always give good deals.

name: Richard Wilson
text: Good food, but messy in the sitting area. Was not very crowded, but floors and tables needed cleaning up. A broom alone would have been nice!!

name: Levi Booth

name: Erika Hughes

name: Hunter Rice
text: New remodel and friendly service. There recent efforts to revamp the store has not gone unnoticed. I went there a few days ago and absolutely had a blast and a full belly.

name: thomas stanford
text: One day you go it is great next day awful. They are working so hard to keep south Jackson going but it is just an ok pizza place.

name: Jose Valencia
text: Horrible pizza place. Ordered boneless wings... It took over 20 mins to get them. The pizzas have been sitting under the heat lamps so long they are dried on the top and bottom. This place need a little care, seats are torn, floor is dirty and the table cloths are sticky. Dessert pizzas are a joke. I think Cicis was better!

name: Skyler Scott
text: The pizza is usually good, but sometimes it's like feeling the ashiest skin on the face of the Earth.

name: Keelo
text: The lunch buffet price is too expensive, and all of the pizza I ate, tasted like it had been sitting for a while. It's a nice atmosphere, and the facility is clean.

text: Ok first off i drove over 45 minutes to come to snappys for their bbq pizza which is my favorite. When i walked into the restaurant, this odor almost immediately filled my nostrils. I can't explain the smell but it was fowl. When i walked ‚Ä¶More
